[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Tuoyo Amewieye” image=”https://nextgen.seamfix.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/WhatsApp-Image-2022-11-15-at-6.00.20-AM.jpeg” image_icon_width=”85px” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Avenir||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_font=”Avenir||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#2a2a2a” body_font_size=”18px” custom_padding=”30px||30px||true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_radii_image=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset5″ box_shadow_horizontal=”14px” box_shadow_vertical=”0px” box_shadow_color=”#F5AB23″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”15px||15px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color_gradient_direction=”243deg” background_color_gradient_start=”#3D72E7″ background_color_gradient_end=”#53a0fe” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”What is the aim of FlexceeTech?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The program is designed to equip entry-level techies with the skills required for a successful career in technology, especially software and product development. The program emphasizes technical skills but also exposes participants to marketable soft skills.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Are all the classes online or in-person?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_color_all=”#1e1584″ border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The classes and workshops are fully online. However, every learner will have access to live classes, facilitators, mentors and learning tribes.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”When will the classes start?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Cohort 3 classes will commence in June 2023

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Will I be certified at the end of the training?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Yes, you certainly will. It is important to note that you must take the certification exam at the completion of the academy.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Is there a baseline aptitude test?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Yes, there is a baseline aptitude assessment. After your application, you would be redirected to take a 20 minutes assessment measuring your verbal reasoning, math/logic and spatial pattern recognition. You will only have three attempts to pass this 20 minute assessment, so please read the instructions carefully.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color_gradient_direction=”243deg” background_color_gradient_start=”#3D72E7″ background_color_gradient_end=”#53a0fe” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”What tracks are in the program?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

There are three tracks:

1. Frontend Development

2. Backend Development

3. Product Design

Want a track to be added? Send an email to Help@flexceetech.com

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”What is the process like?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_color_all=”#1e1584″ border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We have a three step application process:

1. Apply and pay the application fee of ₦8,000.

2. Take and pass the baseline assessment test. You have three attempts to pass this assessment.

3. Select a tuition option and sign enrollment documents.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”How much is the tuition fee?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We have two different payment options available to you. You must select your desired payment plan; the tuition cost can be paid in full or in installments. To see all of your payment options, go to the tuition page.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”When will registration start?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Registration for cohort 3 will open in April 24 2023

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”What scholarship opportunities are available?” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”470px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Nunito Sans|600|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#535b7c” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Nunito Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#959baf” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||6%|” custom_padding=”40px|20px|40px|20px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” border_radii=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” border_width_top=”6px” border_color_top=”#06d665″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(34,56,101,0.12)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

One of our partners has covered parts of the costs of the course for the students. Indigent students, on the other hand, may be eligible for additional financial aid. Please contact Help@flexceetech.com with any questions or concerns.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#2a2a2a” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_color=”#2a2a2a” toggle_font=”Avenir||||||||” toggle_font_size=”20px” body_font=”Avenir||||||||” body_text_color=”#2a2a2a” body_font_size=”20px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Who is Seamfix?” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”on”]

We are a software development company with over a decade of experience in training problem solvers, and building mission-critical solutions that empower organizations.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is the aim of FlexceeTech?” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

The program is designed to equip entry-level techies with the skills required for a successful career in technology, especially software and product development. The program emphasizes technical skills but also exposes participants to marketable soft skills.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is the process like?” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

We have a three step application process:

1. Apply and pay the application fee of ₦8,000.

2. Take and pass the baseline assessment test. You have three attempts to pass this assessment.

3. Select a tuition option and sign enrollment documents.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Are all the classes online or in-person?” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

The classes and workshops are fully online. However, every learner will have access to live classes, facilitators, mentors and learning tribes.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How many cohorts a year?” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

There are 2 cohorts a year. Each cohort has a 6 months duration

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Who should participate in FlexceeTech?” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

This program is for anyone interested in building a career in tech

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is there an initial assessment?” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Yes, there is a baseline aptitude assessment. After your application, you would be redirected to take a 20 minutes assessment measuring your verbal reasoning, math/logic and spatial pattern recognition. You will have three attempts to pass this 20 minute assessment, so please read the instructions carefully.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the requirements/qualifications to join the program?” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

The admission requirements include:

  • A willingness to learn and passion to build a career in tech.
  • Commitment to the learning journey— this should reflect in the things you have done prior to your application. 
  • A basic understanding of your preferred learning path.
  • Passing the initial assessment.
  • Availability for 6 months starting from July.
  • Having a laptop, steady internet connection, and a place where you can concentrate.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Will there be a certificate upon completion? ” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Yes, certificates will be issued.
